# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a progress view from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating a progress view

- **init(progressViewStyle:)**: Creates a progress view with the specified style.
- **init(frame:)**: Creates a progress view with the specified frame rectangle.
